CacheMatch.summary:
The match() method of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to the associated with the first matching request in the object.
If no match is found, the resolves to .
CacheMatch.returns:
A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to the first that matches
the request or to if no match is found.
NOTENote: Cache.match() is basically identical to
, except that rather than resolving with an array of
all matching responses, it resolves with the first matching response only (that is,
response[0]).
